inclusion.criterion: follow up visit to outpatient palliative care clinic
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing to participate in study and sign informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: either patient or family member can not complete assessments independently
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: either patient or family member refuses to participate in study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week and smokes 22 cigarettes per day. He is healthy with no history of allergies or using any medications.
